message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $800,000 is simply too low for me. Considering the value this product holds for you, I'm willing to come down to $875,000. This leaves room for both of us to walk away with a good deal.  Let me know if you're interested in continuing this discussion.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
